abstract: Uncertainty about the Continent’s debt crisis continued to weigh on the euro and on global equities.
snippet: Uncertainty about the Continent’s debt crisis continued to weigh on the euro and on global equities.
lead_paragraph: Stocks staged a late rally and closed slightly higher on Monday, rebounding from a broad early decline rooted in concern that Europe’s debt problems could slow the global economic recovery.

headline.main: Euro Hits a 4-Year Low, Unsettling Markets
headline.print_headline: After Steep Sell-Off, Dow Rallies Back

byline.original: By Christine Hauser and David Jolly
